name: Safe Block Editor by WPMarmite
author: Modern Plugins

sections.description:
Removes a number of features and blocks from the default WordPress editor. Just activate it, and enjoy your cleaner editing experience !

General features removed :

  • Font size picker and custom font size
  • Custom padding and units
  • Custom spacing
  • Color palette, color picker, and duotone filters
  • Link color and text color
  • Gradients
  • Wide and full alignments
  • Block patterns

Blocs removed :

  • Cover
  • Columns
  • Media & Text
  • Custom HTML
  • Verse
  • Pullquote
  • Site Logo
  • Site Title
  • Site Tagline
  • All blocks related to theme/template editing
  • All widgets, including Shortcode, except on widgets admin page and customizer.

Toolbar formats removed :

  • Inline image
  • H1 removed
  • Superscript
  • Subscript
  • Keyboard input

Block styles removed :

  • ‘Default’ and ‘Rounded’ for the core image block
  • ‘Default’ and ‘Large’ for the core quote block
  • ‘Fill’ and ‘Outline’ for the button block
  • ‘Regular’ and ‘Striped’ for the table block

Block supports/features removed :

  • Anchor
  • DropCap
  • Image editing in image block
  • HTML view
  • Reusable block

Credits

Modern Plugins is a new brand founded by WPMarmite, the WordPress blog where you can find in-depth WordPress tutorials for beginners and honest reviews.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Upload the plugin folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
sections.changelog:
1.2

  • Removed blocks related to theme/template editing
  • Refactored removal of support for previous experimental features

1.1

  • Remove custom units, custom paddings, dropcap image editing, and block patterns

1.0

  • Initial release

short_description: Simplifies your authoring experience by removing distracting options in the WordPress editor.
